samples.heading: Plan your day in a snap

fieldPrompt.image_url: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality image with transparent background that represents your business, product, or service. Include specific details about the subject matter, style, lighting, and composition. For best results, specify a clear, well-lit image with good contrast and professional appearance.
fieldPrompt.heading: Write a compelling, attention-grabbing headline (max 30 characters) that communicates your main value proposition or key message. Focus on benefits, outcomes, or what makes your offering unique. Use action words and create excitement.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload your business logo with transparent background (PNG format). The logo should be clear, high-resolution, and easily recognizable at different sizes. Ensure it represents your brand identity effectively.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your website URL (e.g., yourbusiness.com, app.yourbrand.com). Omit http:// or www for a cleaner, more professional appearance.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Select a hex color code (e.g., #4A90E2 for blue, #FF6B6B for red) that matches your brand identity and creates the desired emotional response. This color will be used as the primary background color.
